summary.span: 在樹狀中顯示階層式資料，例如目錄。

span.span: Displays hierarchical data, such as a table of contents, in a tree structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [節點Nodes](#nodes) - [靜態資料Static Data](#static_data) - [繫結至資料Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [動態節點母體擴展Dynamic Node Population](#dynamic_node_population) - [自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [捲動Scrolling](#scrolling) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用來顯示階層式資料，例如資料表的目錄或檔案目錄樹狀結構，並支援下列功能：The control is used to display hierarchical data, such as a table of contents or file directory, in a tree structure and supports the following features: - 資料繫結，可讓控制項繫結至 XML，表格式或關聯式資料的節點。Data binding that allows the nodes of the control to be bound to XML, tabular, or relational data. - 站台瀏覽與整合控制項。Site navigation through integration with the control. - 節點可以顯示為純文字或超連結的文字。Node text that can be displayed as either plain text or hyperlinks. - 以程式設計方式存取建立樹狀結構、 填入節點等動態設定屬性的物件模型。Programmatic access to the object model to create trees, populate nodes, set properties, and so on dynamically. - （在支援的瀏覽器） 的用戶端節點母體擴展。Client-side node population (on supported browsers). - 顯示每個節點旁邊的核取方塊的功能。The ability to display a check box next to each node. - 透過佈景主題、 使用者定義的映像和樣式的可自訂外觀。Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, and styles. > [!NOTE] > 控制項用來在內部使用控制時，才設`true`。The control is designed to be used inside an control only when is set to `true`. 控制項用來更新選取的區域，而不是整個頁面更新與回傳的頁面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 節點Nodes 控制項所組成的節點。The control is made up of nodes. 在樹狀目錄中的每個項目稱為一個節點，而由物件。Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a object. 節點類型的定義方式如下：Node types are defined as follows: - 包含其他節點的節點稱為*父節點*。A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*. - 所包含的另一個節點的節點稱為*子節點*。The node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*. - 沒有子系的節點稱為*分葉節點*。A node that has no children is called a *leaf node*. - 不包含的任何其他節點，但不是所有其他節點上的階節點是*根節點*。The node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*. 節點可以是父代和子系，但根，父代，而且分葉節點為互斥。A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive. 節點的數個視覺和行為屬性會取決於節點是根、 子系或分葉節點。Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a root, child, or leaf node. 雖然一般樹狀結構只能有一個根節點，控制項可讓您將多個根節點加入至樹狀結構。Although a typical tree structure has only one root node, the control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure. 當您想要顯示項目清單，而不會顯示單一根節點，例如產品類別目錄的清單，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single root node, as in a list of product categories. 每個節點都屬性和屬性。Each node has a property and a property. 值屬性顯示在，雖然屬性用來儲存節點，例如傳遞至與節點相關聯的回傳事件的資料有關的任何其他資料。The value of the property is displayed in the , while the property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data that is passed to the postback event that is associated with the node. 節點可以是兩個模式之一： 選取模式和瀏覽模式。A node can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 根據預設，節點處於選取模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要將節點放入瀏覽模式中，設定屬性的節點為空字串以外的值 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 節點處於選取模式中，設定屬性的節點為空字串 ("")。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to an empty string (""). > [!NOTE] > 某些網際網路瀏覽器有可能會影響效能的限制控制項。Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the control. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 有回傳的 2067年字元的 URL 字元限制。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts. 如果節點的 URL 中的字元數大於此數目，展開該節點將會失敗並擲回任何例外狀況。If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown. ## 靜態資料Static Data 最簡單的資料模型的控制項是靜態的資料。The simplest data model of the control is static data. 若要顯示使用宣告式語法的靜態資料，第一次建立巢狀開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To display static data using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下來，建立巢狀結構的樹狀結構``開頭和結尾之間的項目``標記。Next, create the tree structure by nesting `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags. 每個``元素代表在樹狀目錄中的節點，並將對應至物件。Each `` element represents a node in the tree and maps to a object. 您可以設定每個節點的屬性所設定的屬性其``項目。You can set the properties of each node by setting the attributes of its `` element. 若要建立子節點，巢狀其他``開頭和結尾之間的項目``父節點的標記。To create child nodes, nest additional `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags of the parent node. ## 繫結至資料Binding to Data 控制項可以也繫結至資料。The control can also be bound to data. 您可以使用兩種方法之一來繫結控制項至適當的資料來源類型：You can use either of two methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 控制項就可以使用任何資料來源控制項實作介面，例如控制項或控制項。The control can use any data source control that implements the interface, such as an control or a control. 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源控制項的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 控制項可以也繫結至物件或關聯的物件。The control can also be bound to an object or a object with relations. 若要繫結至其中一個資料來源，設定屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源，然後再呼叫方法。To bind to one of these data sources, set the property of the control to the data source, and then call the method. 當繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個屬性 （例如 XML 項目具有多個屬性），節點會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的 預設的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 在 XML 項目，該節點會顯示項目名稱，顯示的樹狀結構的基礎結構，但沒有很有用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以藉由指定樹狀節點繫結使用的節點繫結至特定資料的項目屬性集合。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings using the collection. 集合包含`TreeNodeBinding`物件，定義資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性。The collection contains `TreeNodeBinding` objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 您可以指定要顯示的節點中的繫結和資料項目屬性的準則。You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node. 如需有關樹狀節點繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on tree node bindings, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 惡意使用者可以建立回呼要求並取得資料的節點網頁開發人員不顯示控制項。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，資料來源必須實作之資料的安全性。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 請勿使用屬性隱藏的資料。Do not use the property to hide data. ## 動態節點母體擴展Dynamic Node Population 某些情況下，它不是靜態定義樹狀結構，因為資料來源傳回太多資料，或是要顯示的資料取決於您在執行階段取得的資訊。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically define the tree structure because the data source returns too much data or because the data to display depends on information that you get at run time. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，在執行階段的節點展開時填入該節點。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要以動態方式填入節點，您必須定義的事件處理方法，包含該邏輯填入節點事件。To populate a node dynamically, you must define an event-handling method that contains the logic to populate a node for the event. 瀏覽器支援回呼指令碼也可以利用用戶端節點母體擴展。Browsers that support callback scripts can also take advantage of client-side node population. （這包括 Internet Explorer 5.5 及更新版本和一些其他瀏覽器）。可讓用戶端節點擴展控制項填入用戶端指令碼，當使用者展開節點，而不需要往返伺服器的節點。(This includes Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and some other browsers.) Client-side node population enables the control to populate a node using client script when users expand the node, without requiring a round trip to the server. 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on client-side node population, see . ## 自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface 有許多方法可自訂的外觀控制項。There are many ways to customize the appearance of the control. 首先，您可以指定不同的樣式 （例如 字型和色彩） 的每個節點類型。First, you can specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the node types. 如果您使用階層式樣式表 (CSS) 來自訂控制項的外觀，使用內嵌樣式或個別的 CSS 檔案，但非兩者。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 使用內嵌樣式和個別的 CSS 檔案，可能會造成非預期的結果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. 如需有關如何使用控制項的樣式表的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器控制項和 CSS 樣式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42)。For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42). 下表列出可用的節點樣式。The following table lists the available node styles. |節點的樣式屬性Node style property|描述Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||當滑鼠指標進入此節點的樣式設定。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||分葉節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||節點的預設樣式設定。The default style settings for a node.| ||父節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the root node.| ||選取節點的樣式設定。The style settings for a selected node.| 您也可以藉由控制節點在樹狀結構中的特定深度樣式集合。You can also control the style of nodes at specific depths within the tree by using the collection. 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至節點在樹狀目錄中的第一個層級的樣式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the first level in the tree. 集合中的第二個樣式會對應為樣式的樹狀目錄中，等第二個層級的節點。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the second level in the tree, and so on. 這是最常用於產生目錄樣式導覽功能表的資料表位置的特定深度的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點。This is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. > [!NOTE] > 如果所定義的特定深度層級使用集合，該樣式會覆寫任何根、 父系或分葉節點樣式設定為在該深度的節點。If a style is defined for a certain depth level using the collection, that style overrides any root, parent, or leaf node style settings for the nodes at that depth. 若要變更控制項的外觀的另一個方法是自訂映像中所顯示的控制項。Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images that are displayed in the control. 您可以指定您自己的映像，以不同的組件控制項的自訂集，藉由設定下表中所顯示的內容。You can specify your own custom set of images for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table. |影像屬性Image property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||可摺疊節點指示器顯示影像的 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the collapsible node indicator. 此映像通常是減號 （-）。This image is usually a minus sign (-).| ||展開節點指示器顯示之影像 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the expandable node indicator. 此映像通常是加號 （+）。This image is usually a plus sign (+).| ||包含用來連接到子節點的父節點的線條影像的資料夾 URL。The URL to the folder containing the line images used to connect parent nodes to child nodes. 屬性也必須設定為`true`造成影響的這個屬性。The property must also be set to `true` for this property to have an effect.| ||無法展開節點指示器顯示影像的 URL。The URL to an image displayed for the non-expandable node indicator.| > [!NOTE] > 您不需要自訂每個映像的屬性。You do not need to customize every image property. 如果未明確地設定影像屬性，則會使用內建的預設映像。If an image property is not explicitly set, the built-in default image is used. 控制項也可讓您顯示節點旁邊的核取方塊。The control also allows you to display a check box next to a node. 當以外屬性設定為值`TreeNodeTypes.None`，指定的節點型別旁顯示核取方塊。When the property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeTypes.None`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node types. > [!NOTE] > 屬性可以設定為的位元組合列舉成員值。The property can be set to a bitwise combination of the enumeration member values. 網頁回傳至伺服器，每次集合會自動填入選取的節點。Each time the page is posted to the server, the collection is automatically populated with the selected nodes. 當顯示核取方塊時，您可以使用執行自訂常式，每當發佈至伺服器期間的核取方塊的狀態變更事件。When check boxes are displayed, you can use the event to run a custom routine whenever the state of a check box changes between posts to the server. ## 事件Events 控制項提供數個事件，您可以程式設計的。The control provides several events that you can program against. 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生時的核取方塊控制項變更發佈至伺服器之間的狀態。Occurs when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server.| ||當在 控制項中選取節點時就會發生。Occurs when a node is selected in the control.| ||當在 控制項中展開節點時就會發生。Occurs when a node is expanded in the control.| ||當在 控制項中摺疊節點時就會發生。Occurs when a node is collapsed in the control.| ||當在 控制項中展開 屬性設為 `true` 的節點時發生。Occurs when a node with its property set to `true` is expanded in the control.| ||當資料項目繫結至 控制項中的節點時就會發生。Occurs when a data item is bound to a node in the control.| ## 捲動Scrolling 控制項沒有內建捲動。The control does not have built-in scrolling. 若要加入捲動功能，加上控制控制，並將捲軸來加入控制項。To add scrolling, place the control in a control and add scrollbars to the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[面板 Web 伺服器控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b)。For more information, see [Panel Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/127b61ed-87f2-46f4-92a3-785166e7245b). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 協助工具標準，可能不符合呈現，根據預設，此控制項的標記。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本章節包含七個的程式碼範例：This section contains seven code examples: - 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定第二個程式碼範例中的框架。The first code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the second code example. - 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用宣告式語法，來顯示靜態資料控制項。The second code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to display static data in the control. - 第三個的程式碼範例示範如何將繫結XML 資料來源的控制項。The third code example demonstrates how to bind the control to an XML data source. - 第四個程式碼範例會提供第三個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The fourth code example provides sample XML data for the third code example. - 第五個的程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項繫結至站台瀏覽控制項。The fifth code example demonstrates how to use the control for site navigation by binding it to a control. - 第六個程式碼範例提供第五個的程式碼範例的範例網站地圖資料。The sixth code example provides sample site map data for the fifth code example. - 第七個的程式碼範例示範如何擴展中的節點從用戶端的控制項。The seventh code example demonstrates how to populate the nodes in the control from the client. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定如下列程式碼範例的框架。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the following code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 樹狀節點繫結會定義資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性。Tree node bindings define the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to. 繫結至其中的每個資料項目包含多個屬性 （例如 XML 項目具有多個屬性），資料來源時控制項需要知道哪些資料的項目要繫結屬性的屬性。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), the control needs to know which data item property to bind to which property. 如果屬性設定為`true`、控制項自動產生預設樹狀節點繫結設定屬性為值的繫結相關聯的物件所傳回`ToString`資料項目的方法。If the property is set to `true`, the control automatically generates default tree node bindings that set the property of the object that is associated with the binding to the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item. > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的樹狀節點繫結不會加入至集合。The automatically generated tree node bindings are not added to the collection. 在 XML 項目時，所傳回的值的情況下`ToString`方法則是項目名稱，顯示的 XML 檔案的基礎結構，但沒有很有用。In the case of an XML element, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method is the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the XML file, but is not very useful otherwise. 若要建立更有用的樹狀結構，您必須定義您自己的樹狀節點繫結填入集合。To create a more useful tree, you must define your own tree node bindings by populating the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果您定義集合，控制項而不是自動產生的樹狀節點繫結中使用這些值。If you define a collection, the control uses those values instead of automatically generated tree node bindings. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定以停用自動樹狀結構節點繫結產生屬性`false`。The first code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. 第二個程式碼範例的第一個程式碼範例提供範例網站地圖資料。The second code example provides sample site map data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定以停用自動樹狀結構節點繫結產生屬性`false`。The following code example demonstrates how to disable automatic tree node binding generation by setting the property to `false`. A集合，然後定義建立關聯性中的資料項目之間控制項和節點控制項。A collection is then defined to establish the relationship between the data items in a control and the nodes of the control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製範例站台對應資料，此程式碼範例中，為 Web.sitemap 檔案之後提供。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data, provided after this code example, to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/CS/treeviewautogeneratebindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewAutoGenerateBindings/VB/treeviewautogeneratebindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供範例網站導覽資料，上述範例。The following code example provides sample site map data for the preceding example. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取方塊會顯示在控制項 (藉由設定屬性以外的值為`TreeNodeType.None`)，使用屬性來判斷哪一個節點會顯示選取的核取方塊。When check boxes are displayed in the control (by setting the property to a value other than `TreeNodeType.None`), use the property to determine which nodes display a selected check box. 這個集合通常用於逐一查看所有已選取的核取方塊，在樹狀目錄中的節點。This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the nodes that have a selected check box in the tree. 就會引發事件時的核取方塊控制項變更發佈至伺服器之間的狀態。The event is raised when the check boxes of the control change state between posts to the server. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如更新資料庫或顯示的內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 樹狀結構的深度優先周遊填入集合： 之前的下一個父節點會填入處理每個父節點及其子節點下。The collection is populated using a depth-first traversal of the tree structure: each parent node is processed down to its child nodes before the next parent node is populated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷哪些節點在選取的核取方塊控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which nodes have a selected check box in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂映像可摺疊節點的指標。Use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 此映像可摺疊的節點旁會顯示，而且通常是減號 （-）。This image is displayed next to a collapsible node and is usually a minus sign (-). 當屬性設定為`true`、控制項顯示加號 （+） 或減號 sign(-) 或影像預留位置，表示節點是否可展開、 摺疊，或無法展開分別節點旁邊。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or a minus sign(-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以指定第一個設定的自訂映像屬性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然後設定， ，和屬性，以自訂影像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果未不指定任何影像，則會使用預設映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隱藏展開節點指示器，設定屬性`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要確認節點在正確對齊控制使用自訂映像時，請確定所指定的所有映像， ，和屬性有相同的維度。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 當使用自訂映像可摺疊節點指標時，您也應該考慮設定屬性來指定映像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the collapsible node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂映像可摺疊節點的指標。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator. 程式碼範例，以顯示在控制項中顯示的映像，您必須提供自己的映像和屬性必須設定為`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataBindings As TreeNodeBindingCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這些物件會定義資料項目與其所繫結至的節點之間的關聯性。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.

value.span: ，表示資料項目與其所繫結至的節點之間的關聯性。

span.span: A that represents the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 集合包含物件，定義資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 當繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個屬性 （例如 XML 項目具有多個屬性），節點會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的 預設的方法。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 在 XML 項目，該節點會顯示項目名稱，其中顯示基礎結構的樹狀目錄中，不過沒有非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以藉由指定樹狀節點繫結，節點繫結至特定的資料屬性。You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings. 當定義資料項目及節點之間的關聯性，您必須指定繫結和值的屬性繫結準則物件。When defining the relationship between a data item and a node, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the values to bind to the properties of object. 準則則表示資料的項目應該繫結到節點。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a node. 使用節點深度、 資料成員，或兩者，可以指定準則。The criteria can be specified with a node depth, a data member, or both. 節點深度指定節點層級取得繫結。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 比方說，如果您指定節點的深度為 0，層級 0 的樹狀結構中的所有節點都繫都結使用樹狀目錄節點繫結。For example, if you specify a node depth of 0, all nodes in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the tree node binding. 資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 若為多個物件定義與彼此衝突控制項適用於樹狀節點繫結，以下列順序的優先順序：If multiple objects are defined that conflict with each other, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定義深度和資料成員的物件。The object that defines both a depth and a data member. 2. 定義只深度的物件。The object that defines only the depth. 3. 定義資料成員的物件。The object that defines only the data member. 4. 深度和資料成員都不會定義的物件。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. 如果符合相同的優先順序條件指定了多個繫結，會套用在集合中的第一個繫結。If multiple bindings are specified that meet the same precedence criteria, the first binding in the collection is applied. 一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性值可繫結的物件。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以將繫結至屬性或欄位的資料項目，或顯示靜態值。You can either bind to an attribute or field of a data item or display a static value. 如需有關繫結的屬性物件的值，請參閱。For more information on binding the properties of a object to a value, see . 雖然以程式設計方式填入集合，則通常會以宣告方式設定。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要指定樹狀節點繫結，第一次建立巢狀開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the tree node bindings, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下來，將``開頭和結尾之間的項目``指定要繫結，您每個樹狀節點的標記。Next, place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each tree node binding you want to specify. 資料繫結所設定的建立時屬性控制權傳輸至`true`，繫結所建立的屬性設定為`true`。When data bindings are created by setting the property of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以宣告方式建立的資料繫結具有屬性設定為`false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用宣告式語法可讓您控制個別的資料繫結的行為。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用定義資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性的集合。The first code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用定義資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. 這個範例會指定只有繫結屬性。This example specifies only the property of the binding. 無法加入輕微的效能改善，藉由指定屬性。A slight performance gain could be added by also specifying the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/CS/treeviewxmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewXml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewXml/VB/treeviewxmlvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述範例。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding example. ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否控制項呈現相容的瀏覽器，以展開和摺疊的事件處理上的用戶端指令碼。Use the property to specify whether the control renders client-side script on compatible browsers to handle expanding and collapsing events. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，相容的瀏覽器執行的程式碼，以展開和摺疊節點，用戶端上。When this property is set to `true`, compatible browsers execute the code to expand and collapse nodes on the client. 樹狀目錄節點資料必須事先知道，讓用戶端指令碼工作。The tree node data must be known in advance for the client-side script to work. 使用用戶端指令碼可避免回傳至伺服器每次節點為展開或摺疊。Using client script prevents a post back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 當無法事先知道樹狀節點資料時，填入來自用戶端的節點如果`PopulateNodesFromClient`屬性也會設為`true`。When the tree node data is not known in advance, nodes can be populated from the client, if the `PopulateNodesFromClient` property is also set to `true`. 在此案例中，您也必須提供的事件處理方法事件，以填入節點。In this scenario, you must also provide an event-handling method for the event to populate the nodes. 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on client-side node population, see . > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`false`、回傳至伺服器每次節點為展開或摺疊的控制項。If the property is set to `false`, the control posts back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來呈現用來展開和摺疊節點，在相容的瀏覽器上的用戶端指令碼。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來呈現用來展開和摺疊節點，在相容的瀏覽器上的用戶端指令碼。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to render client-side script that is used to expand and collapse nodes on compatible browsers. 請注意到伺服器後，才能展開和摺疊的節點時屬性設定為`false`。Notice that a post to the server is required to expand and collapse a node when the property is set to `false`. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/CS/treeviewenableclientscriptcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewEnableClientScript#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewEnableClientScript/VB/treeviewenableclientscriptvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂映像可展開的節點指示器。Use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 此映像可展開的節點旁會顯示，而且通常是加號 （+）。This image is displayed next to an expandable node and is usually a plus sign (+). 當屬性設定為`true`、控制項顯示加號 （+） 或減號 （-） 或影像預留位置，表示節點是否可展開、 摺疊，或無法展開分別節點旁邊。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以指定第一個設定的自訂映像屬性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然後設定， ，和屬性，以自訂影像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs for the custom images. 如果未不指定任何影像，則會使用預設映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隱藏展開節點指示器，設定屬性`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要確認節點在正確對齊控制使用自訂映像時，請確定所指定的所有映像， ，和屬性有相同的維度。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 若要正確地顯示的自訂映像，您可能需要設定至`false`。To display a custom image correctly, you may need to set to `false`. 當使用自訂映像可展開節點指標時，您也應該考慮設定屬性來指定映像的工具提示。When using a custom image for the expandable node indicator, you should also consider setting the property to specify a ToolTip for the image. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂映像可展開的節點指示器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator. 程式碼範例，以顯示在控制項中顯示的映像，您必須提供自己的映像和屬性必須設定為`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控制節點的外觀，當滑鼠指標進入此屬性。Use the property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 只在指令碼支援的用戶端上支援此功能。This feature is supported only on script-capable clients. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用屬性，您必須包含``具有項目`runat="server"`屬性。To use the property, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 樣式屬性會套用順序如下：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. > [!NOTE] > 樣式設定屬性覆寫中的任何對應節點樣式設定， ， ， ，或屬性。The style settings for the property override any corresponding node style settings that are in the , , , , or property. 屬性則不會與節點的方式呈現其屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The property is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 不同於和屬性，也就是物件屬性是物件。Unlike the and the properties, which are objects, the property is a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制節點的外觀，當滑鼠指標進入此屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 讓範例能夠運作，您必須包含``具有項目`runat="server"`屬性。For this example to work, you must include a `` element with a `runat="server"` attribute. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要用於映像群組控制項。Use the property to specify the group of images to use for the control. 您可以選取一組預先定義的映像，以提供控制項的標準外觀，或定義您自己自訂的集合。You can either select a predefined set of images to give the control a standard look or define your own custom set. > [!NOTE] > 屬性不會影響任何節點的樣式設定。The property does not affect any style settings for a node. 設定適當的樣式屬性，例如屬性，如果您想要新增自訂色彩和間距。Set the appropriate style property, such as the property, if you want to add custom colors and spacing. 下表列出的有效值屬性。The following table lists the valid values for The property. |映像集Image set|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`|使用箭號映像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses arrow images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`|使用菱形式的項目符號影像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses diamond-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`|使用方形的項目符號影像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses square-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`|預先定義的分段、菱形項目符號影像集。A predefined set of sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`|預先定義的替代分段、菱形項目符號影像集，影像的大小會因層級而異。A predefined set of alternate sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images in sizes that vary by level.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`|使用 MSN Messenger 映像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses MSN Messenger images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`|設定使用者定義的映像。A user-defined image set.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Events`|使用事件記錄檔樣式影像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses event log-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Faq`|使用常見問題集樣式影像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses FAQ-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`|使用電子郵件樣式影像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses email-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.News`|預先定義的映像組，使用新聞群組樣式的影像。A predefined image set that uses newsgroup-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple`|使用簡單的圖形外框的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses simple shape outlines.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`|使用簡單填滿的圖案的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses simple filled shapes.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`|使用 MSDN 映像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses MSDN images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`|使用 Microsoft Windows 說明的映像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses Microsoft Windows Help images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`|使用 Microsoft Windows XP 中可用的 Windows 檔案總管映像的預先定義的映像集。A predefined image set that uses Windows Explorer images available in Microsoft Windows XP.| 在定義一組自訂映像時，您應該指定映像的每一個屬性下表中。When defining a custom set of images, you should specify an image for each of the properties in the following table. 否則，會使用該屬性的預設影像。Otherwise, the default image for that property is used. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||可摺疊節點指標的自訂影像 URL。The URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.| ||展開節點指示器的自訂影像 URL。The URL to a custom image for the expandable node indicator.| ||包含連接節點的線條的自訂映像資料夾的 URL。The URL to a folder that contains custom images for the lines that connect nodes.| ||無法展開節點指標的自訂影像 URL。The URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.| 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示 Windows 檔案總管中的一組影像中控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the Windows Explorer set of images in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制分葉節點中的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. 如果您要產生的目錄樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。If you need to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制分葉節點中的外觀控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewLeafNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewLeafNodeStyle/CS/treeviewleafnodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewLeafNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewLeafNodeStyle/VB/treeviewleafnodestylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合，做為個別的樣式屬性的替代方式 (例如屬性) 來控制在個別的階層樹狀結構節點的樣式。Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as the property) to control the style of nodes at the individual levels of the tree. 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至第一層的樹狀結構中節點的樣式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the first level of the tree. 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至樹狀目錄中，等第二層節點的樣式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the second level of the tree, and so on. 這個屬性是最常用來產生目錄樣式導覽功能表的資料表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點。This property is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes. 樣式屬性會套用順序如下：Style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建立導覽功能表的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a navigation menu. 控制項始終是完全展開，展開節點指示器與隱藏的映像。The control is always fully expanded, with the expansion node indicators and images hidden. 此外，屬性用來控制節點層級的間距。Also, the property is used to control the spacing of the node levels. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以顯示連接至父節點的子節點的行時屬性設定為`true`。The control can display lines that connect child nodes to parent nodes when the property is set to `true`. 當顯示線條時，使用屬性可指定網路存取的資料夾，其中包含一組用於線條預先呈現影像。When lines are displayed, use the property to specify a Web-accessible folder that contains the set of pre-rendered images to use for the lines. 下表描述所使用的映像控制項。The following table describes the images that are used by the control. |ImageImage|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |Dash.gifDash.gif|樹狀結構中的只能有一個根節點與根節點時，根節點旁邊顯示的線條影像是分葉。A line image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure and the root node is a leaf.| |Dashminus.gifDashminus.gif|減號 （-） 表示的根節點展開的樹狀結構中只能有一個根節點時，根節點旁邊顯示的影像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is expanded.| |Dashplus.gifDashplus.gif|表示根節點已摺疊樹狀結構中只能有一個根節點時，根節點旁顯示加號 （+） 映像。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is collapsed.| |I.gifI.gif|顯示的線條影像將相鄰的節點連接。A line image displayed to connect adjacent nodes.| |L.gifL.gif|列旁邊顯示的影像到最後一個節點在分支中分葉節點時。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch when the node is a leaf.| |Lminus.gifLminus.gif|列旁邊顯示的影像到最後一個節點，表示節點已展開分支中。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Lplus.gifLplus.gif|列旁邊顯示的影像到最後一個節點，表示節點已摺疊的分支中。A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is collapsed.| |Minus.gifMinus.gif|顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的減號 （-） 映像會展開。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此映像不包含額外的程式行，而且根節點已經摺疊一次之後，才會顯示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been collapsed once. 當第一次載入頁面時，會顯示 Rminus.gif 映像。When the page is first loaded, the Rminus.gif image is displayed.| |Noexpand.gifNoexpand.gif|空白的空格字元顯示的影像是分葉節點旁邊。A blank spacer image displayed next to a leaf node. 此映像可讓文字垂直對齊。This image allows text to line up vertically.| |Plus.gifPlus.gif|顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的加號 （+） 映像會摺疊。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此映像不包含額外的程式行，而且根節點已展開之後，才會顯示。This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been expanded once. 當第一次載入頁面時，會顯示 Rplus.gif 映像。When the page is first loaded, the Rplus.gif image is displayed.| |R.gifR.gif|在包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁顯示的線條影像為分葉節點。A line image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is a leaf node.| |Rminus.gifRminus.gif|顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的減號 （-） 映像會展開。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded. 此映像包含額外的程式行，而且只在第一次載入頁面時，才會顯示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 在根目錄之後節點已經摺疊一旦 Minus.gif 影像隨即顯示。After the root node has been collapsed once, The Minus.gif image is displayed.| |Rplus.gifRplus.gif|顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的加號 （+） 映像會摺疊。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed. 此映像包含額外的程式行，而且只在第一次載入頁面時，才會顯示。This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded. 在根目錄之後已經展開節點之後，Plus.gif 影像隨即顯示。After the root node has been expanded once, the Plus.gif image is displayed.| |T.gifT.gif|顯示的線條影像的中間 （位於 t 交集處） 的樹狀節點旁，表示節點為分葉節點。A line image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is a leaf.| |Tminus.gifTminus.gif|減號 （-），表示節點已展開的中間 （位於 t 交集處） 的樹狀節點旁顯示影像。A minus sign (-) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Tplus.gifTplus.gif|指出節點已摺疊的中間 （位於 t 交集處） 的樹狀節點旁顯示加號 （+） 映像。A plus sign (+) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 如果未設定屬性，控制項將會使用內建的預設映像 （20 x 20 像素為單位）。If the property is not set, the control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels). 視覺化的設計工具，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 提供工具來產生線條影像。Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images. 在執行的階段不會翻轉由右至左顯示的自訂映像。The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays. 若要支援左到右及從右至左的網頁，您必須建立兩個方向的影像集合。To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定包含要在中顯示的線條影像的資料夾控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the folder that contains the line images to display in the control. 若要使用此範例中，使用事先列設計工具 工具來建立一組線條影像。To work with this example, use the Line Designer tool beforehand to create a set of line images. 請將它們放在目錄內命名 LineImages 範例應用程式的資料夾。Place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application. remarks.format:
## Remarks 繫結時控制項至資料來源，使用屬性來限制要繫結至控制項的樹狀目錄層級數目。When binding the control to a data source, use the property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control. 例如，將此屬性設定為`2`根節點以及任何節點，會立即在根節點下，會將繫結控制項。For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the control. 資料來源中的所有其餘節點都會被忽略。All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 惡意使用者可以建立回呼要求並取得資料的節點網頁開發人員不顯示控制項。A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the control that the page developer is not displaying. 因此，資料來源必須實作之資料的安全性。Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source. 請勿使用屬性隱藏的資料。Do not use the property to hide data. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性要繫結只有第一個兩個節點層級 （深度 0 和 1）控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性要繫結只有第一個兩個節點層級 （深度 0 和 1）控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the control. 資料來源中的所有節點層級會被都忽略。All node levels in the data source are ignored. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth/CS/treeviewmaxdatabinddepthcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewMaxDataBindDepth/VB/treeviewmaxdatabinddepthvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得物件，其中包含在樹狀目錄中的所有根節點。Use the property to get a object that contains all the root nodes in the tree. 這個集合通常用來快速地逐一查看所有根節點，或存取特定根節點在樹狀目錄中。This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree. > [!NOTE] > 典型的樹狀結構有只有一個根節點。不過，您可以加入多個根節點控制項。A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the control. 屬性也可用來以程式設計方式管理在樹狀目錄中的根節點。The property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically. 您可以加入、 插入、 移除及擷取從集合的物件。You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects from the collection. 集合的任何更新會自動反映在往返到伺服器的下一步 後的控制項。Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the control after the next round trip to the server. 若要存取根節點的子節點，請使用節點的屬性。To access the child nodes of a root node, use the property of the node. 使用節點層級下瀏覽每個後續的父層級節點的屬性。Use the property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用周遊樹狀目錄的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the tree. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的節點的預設外觀控制項。Use the property to control the default appearance of a node in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `NodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `NodeStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `NodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `NodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. > [!NOTE] > 中對應的節點樣式設定， ，或屬性會覆寫的樣式設定屬性。The corresponding node style settings in the , , or properties override the style settings of the property. 如果您要產生的內容樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制節點中的外觀控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of nodes in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定非可展開的節點指示器的自訂映像。Use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. 無法展開節點指標影像 （或空格字元） 旁會顯示分葉節點 （取代的可展開及摺疊節點指標） 對齊父代或根節點的分葉節點。The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes. 當屬性設定為`true`、控制項顯示加號 （+） 或減號 （-） 或影像預留位置，表示節點是否可展開、 摺疊，或無法展開分別節點旁邊。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以指定第一個設定的自訂映像屬性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然後設定， ，和屬性，以自訂影像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs of the custom images. 如果未不指定任何影像，則會使用預設映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 若要隱藏展開節點指示器，設定屬性`false`。To hide the expansion node indicators, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 若要確認節點在正確對齊控制使用自訂映像時，請確定所指定的所有映像， ，和屬性有相同的維度。To ensure that nodes align correctly in the control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the , , and properties have the same dimensions. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定非可展開的節點指示器的自訂映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator. 程式碼範例，以顯示在控制項中顯示的映像，您必須提供自己的映像和屬性必須設定為`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫控制項引發事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用類別。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料項目所繫結中的節點時，就會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when a data item is bound to a node in the control. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，在執行階段的節點展開時填入該節點。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要以動態方式填入節點，請先設定屬性節點，以`true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下來，定義的事件處理方法以程式設計方式填入節點的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件處理方法會從資料來源擷取節點的資料、 將資料放入節點結構，和將節點結構在擴展節點的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 節點結構由加入物件加入至父節點的集合。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，必須以動態方式填入節點。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 您無法以宣告方式建立巢狀其; 下的另一個節點否則，會在頁面上發生錯誤。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支援的瀏覽器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 相容的瀏覽器和更新版本) 也可以利用用戶端節點填入。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 啟用時，這可讓控制項來動態填入用戶端上的節點，展開該節點時，這會避免需回傳至伺服器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on client-side node population, see . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParentNodeStyle As TreeNodeStyle

summary.span: 取得 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 控制項中父節點的外觀。

span.span: Gets a reference to the object that allows you to set the appearance of parent nodes in the control.

value.span: 的參考，表示 控制項中父節點的樣式。

span.span: A reference to the that represents the style of the parent nodes in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的父節點的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 。. 4. 。. 如果您要產生的內容樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制中的父節點的外觀控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewParentNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewParentNodeStyle/CS/treeviewparentnodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewParentNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewParentNodeStyle/VB/treeviewparentnodestylevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char PathSeparator { char get(); void set(char value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字元，用於分隔 屬性指定的節點值。

span.span: Gets or sets the character that is used to delimit the node values that are specified by the property.

value.span: 用於分隔 屬性中指定之節點值的字元。

span.span: The character used to delimit the node values specified in the property.

value.span: 預設為斜線符號 (/)。

span.span: The default is a slash mark (/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含表單的目前節點的路徑從根節點的節點值的分隔符號分隔清單。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node. 使用屬性，以指定的分隔符號字元，用以分隔節點值。Use the property to specify the delimiter character that is used to separate the node values. 這個值通常用於剖析為個別值的清單。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values. 根據文字中顯示控制項，以避免任何衝突變更，可能需要分隔符號字元。Depending on the text that is displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果您設定逗號分隔符號字元，所顯示的文字不應該包含任何逗號;否則，屬性無法正確剖析。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the property cannot be parsed accurately. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的分隔符號字元節點的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the delimiter character for the property of a node. 此值，然後用來剖析的個別值的屬性。This value is then used to parse the property for the individual values. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/CS/treeviewpathseparatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/VB/treeviewpathseparatorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，在執行階段的節點展開時填入該節點。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 除了填入隨選的節點，便可填入直接上支援的用戶端瀏覽器的節點。In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser. 當屬性設定為`true`，服務會呼叫從用戶端填入樹狀結構節點中，如此就不需回傳至伺服器。When the property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server. 否則，控制項回傳至伺服器來填入節點。Otherwise, the control posts back to the server to populate the nodes. > [!NOTE] > 屬性也必須設定為`true`順序屬性設定為`true`。The property must also be set to `true` in order for the property to be set to `true`. 若要填入用戶端上的節點，請先設定屬性`true`，然後設定屬性節點，以`true`。To populate a node on the client, first set the property to `true` and then set the property for the node to `true`. 接下來，定義的事件處理方法以程式設計方式填入節點的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that programmatically populates the node. 典型的事件處理方法會從資料來源擷取節點的資料、 將資料放入節點結構，和將節點結構在擴展節點的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 您將建立的節點結構物件加入至父節點的集合。You create a node structure by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，必須以動態方式填入節點。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 您無法以宣告方式建立巢狀其; 下的另一個節點否則，會在頁面上發生錯誤。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. > [!NOTE] > 瀏覽器支援回呼指令碼支援的用戶端節點母體擴展的功能。The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts. 若要檢查瀏覽器是否支援回呼指令碼存取，請使用屬性類別。To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the property of the class. 您可以存取的執行個體類別目前的要求，透過屬性類別。You can access the instance of the class for the current request through the property of the class. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來啟用用戶端母體擴展中的節點控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable client-side population of the nodes in the control. 請注意，當啟用用戶端節點擴展時，節點會自動填入用戶端，而不需回傳至伺服器上。Notice that when client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`參數之控制項的實作方法介面。The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method of the control that implements the interface. 這控制項也會轉譯導致回傳事件發生的 HTML 項目。This control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback event to occur. 如果控制項轉譯回傳至伺服器的用戶端指令碼時，傳入的引數，從指令碼`eventArgument`參數。If the control renders client-side script to post back to the server, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果因為簡單回傳事件提交至伺服器，`eventArgument`參數是`null`。If the postback event is caused by a simple submit to the server, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`. 方法提供許多事件會由 HTML 和 Web 伺服器控制項所實作的功能。The method provides the functionality for many events that are implemented by HTML and Web server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的根節點的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the root node in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties. 3. 4. 。. 如果您要產生的內容樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the property instead of setting the individual style properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制中的根節點的外觀控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the root node in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在節點的文字控制項可以處於兩種模式： 選取模式和瀏覽模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode. 根據預設，節點處於選取模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要將節點放入瀏覽模式中，設定屬性的節點為空字串以外的值 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the property for the node to a value other than an empty string (""). 節點處於選取模式中，設定屬性的節點為空字串 ("")。To put a node into selection mode, set the property for the node to empty string (""). 當節點處於選取模式時，使用者可以按一下節點來選取節點中的文字。When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node. 使用屬性來判斷哪一個節點中選取控制項。Use the property to determine which node is selected in the control. > [!NOTE] > 節點不能為時選取控制項會顯示超連結。A node cannot be selected when the control displays hyperlinks. 當顯示超連結時，屬性一律會傳回`null`。When hyperlinks are displayed, the property always returns `null`. 當使用者選取的不同節點即可在新的節點中，文字控制項引發事件時，根據預設。When the user selects a different node in the control by clicking the text in the new node, the event is raised, by default. 您可以設定來指定不同的事件屬性的屬性。You can specify a different event by setting the property for the property. 下表列出可用的選項。The following table lists the available options. |選取動作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||切換展開或摺疊節點。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 引發或事件，視需要。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||選取節點時，不引發任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||選取節點時，引發 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||選取節點時，引發 和 事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 的節點不會呈現其屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷所選取的節點中的值控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the value of the selected node in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/CS/treeviewselectednodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/VB/treeviewselectednodestylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs when a node is selected in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中選取節點時，就會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when a node is selected in the control. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如更新顯示的內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. 您可以選擇設定屬性節點，以指定選取該節點時，就會引發的事件。You can optionally set the property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected. 下表列出可用的選項。The following table lists the available options. |選取動作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||切換展開或摺疊節點。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 引發或事件，視需要。Raises the or event, as appropriate.| ||選取節點時，不引發任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| ||選取節點時，引發 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| ||選取節點時，引發 和 事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 的節點不會呈現其屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 時使用者按下一個節點只能在 post 上引發事件。The event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node. 如果未引發事件屬性以程式設計方式變更。The event is not fired if the property is changed programmatically. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件來更新控制項中選取節點時控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update a control when a node is selected in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/CS/treeviewselectednodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewSelectedNodeStyle/VB/treeviewselectednodestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出哪些節點型別會在 控制項中顯示核取方塊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which node types will display a check box in the control.

value.span: 值的位元組合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多節點選取項目中提供支援控制項，您可以顯示的映像 節點旁邊的核取方塊。To provide multi-node selection support in the control, you can display check boxes next to the image for a node. 使用屬性，以指定哪種節點類型會顯示核取方塊。Use the property to specify which node types will display a check box. 例如，如果這個屬性設定為`TreeNodeType.Parent`，核取方塊會顯示在樹狀目錄中每個父節點。For example, if this property is set to `TreeNodeType.Parent`, check boxes are displayed for each parent node in the tree. 下表列出這個屬性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for this property. |節點類型Node type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeType.All`|核取方塊會顯示所有節點。Check boxes are displayed for all nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Leaf`|所有分葉節點會顯示核取方塊。Check boxes are displayed for all leaf nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.None`|不會顯示核取方塊。Check boxes are not displayed.| |`TreeNodeType.Parent`|核取方塊會顯示所有父節點。Check boxes are displayed for all parent nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Root`|核取方塊會顯示為所有根節點。Check boxes are displayed for all root nodes.| 用於列舉型別屬性是旗標列舉，可讓您結合透過位元運算的值。The enumeration type that is used for the property is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations. 例如，若要顯示父節點和分葉節點的核取方塊，使用位元 OR 運算子結合`TreeNodeType.Parent`和`TreeNodeType.Leaf`值。For example, to display check boxes for the parent and leaf nodes, use the bitwise OR operator to combine the `TreeNodeType.Parent` and `TreeNodeType.Leaf` values. 若要判斷哪一個節點擁有其核取方塊選取，逐一查看的節點集合。To determine which nodes have their check box selected, iterate through the nodes of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 您可以覆寫設定所設定每個節點的屬性。You can override the setting by setting the property for each node. 如果您需要提供只有單一選取支援，請考慮使用屬性。If you need to provide only single-selection support, consider using the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示和隱藏不同節點型別的核取方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to show and hide the check boxes for the different node types. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/CS/treeviewshowcheckboxescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewShowCheckBoxes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewShowCheckBoxes/VB/treeviewshowcheckboxesvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 位元組合值超出 列舉型別的範圍。

span.span: The bitwise combination value is outside the range of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 展開節點指標用來顯示節點是否已展開、 摺疊，或無法展開。Expansion node indicators are used to show whether a node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable. 使用屬性來指定是否展開節點指示器會顯示在控制項。Use the property to specify whether the expansion node indicators are displayed in the control. 當屬性設定為`true`、控制項顯示加號 （+） 或減號 （-） 或影像預留位置，表示節點是否可展開、 摺疊，或無法展開分別節點旁邊。When the property is set to `true`, the control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively. 您可以指定第一個設定的自訂映像屬性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然後設定， ，和屬性，以自訂影像的 Url。You can specify custom images by first setting the property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the , , and properties to the URLs of the custom images. 如果未不指定任何影像，則會使用預設映像。If no images are specified, the default images are used. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示和隱藏擴充節點圖示。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to show and hide the expansion node icons. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否要顯示要連接至父節點的子節點的線條。Use the property to specify whether the lines that are connecting child nodes to parent nodes are displayed. 當這個屬性設定為`true`、控制項搜尋所指定的 Web 存取資料夾線條影像的屬性。When this property is set to `true`, the control searches the Web-accessible folder that is specified by the property for the line images. > [!NOTE] > 如果未設定屬性，控制項將會使用內建的預設映像 （20 x 20 像素為單位）。If the property is not set, the control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示連線節點中的行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display lines connecting nodes in the control. 請務必使用行設計師工具來建立一組線條影像，並將它們放在命名 LineImages 目錄中的範例應用程式的資料夾。Be sure to use the Line Designer tool to create a set of line images and place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application. value.span: 預設值是「略過巡覽連結」。

span.span: The default is "Skip Navigation Links."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是您可以設定讓網頁更多或少都能存取的屬性。The property is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible. 一種機制，以略過的內容來自大聲閱讀螢幕助讀程式的使用者可以提供網頁包含重複的內容。Web pages that contain content that repeats can provide for a mechanism for users of screen readers to skip the content from being read aloud. 控制項提供屬性做為螢幕助讀程式所要略過整個控制項的方式。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果屬性設定，呈現不可見的影像的替代文字，讓使用者選擇跳至控制項的結尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control. 螢幕助讀程式大聲的替代文字，而影像佔用一個像素的空間。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, while the image occupies only one pixel space. 像素精確控制呈現頁面的詳細資訊，請設定屬性設為空字串 ("")，並提供您自己的機制，以略過樹狀結構。For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the tree. 根據預設，讓螢幕助讀員略過控制項屬性設定為空字串。The property is set to the empty string by default, which makes screen readers not skip the control. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容的連結節點時按一下該節點。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 請勿設定屬性，如果轉譯的輸出為必須 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property, if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，您應該避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示 Web 內容在按下該節點時，連結至新視窗中的節點。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the Web content that is linked to a node in a new window when that node is clicked. remarks.format:
## Remarks 資料項目所繫結中的節點時，就會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when a data item is bound to a node in the control. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用事件以某些條件符合時，變更節點的影像。The first code example demonstrates how to use the event to change the image for a node when some condition is met. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件以某些條件符合時，變更節點的影像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to change the image for a node when some condition is met. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. 另外請務必提供這個範例顯示的影像。Also be sure to provide your own images for this example to display. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound/CS/treeviewtreenodedataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeDataBound/VB/treeviewtreenodedataboundvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```

summary.span: 當在 控制項中展開 屬性設為 的節點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a node with its property set to is expanded in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，在執行階段的節點展開時填入該節點。When the property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 若要以動態方式填入節點，請先設定屬性節點，以`true`。To populate a node dynamically, first set the property for the node to `true`. 接下來，定義的事件處理方法以程式設計方式填入節點的事件。Next, define an event-handling method for the event that populates the node programmatically. 典型的事件處理方法會從資料來源擷取節點的資料、 將資料放入節點結構，和將節點結構在擴展節點的集合。A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the collection of the node being populated. 節點結構由加入物件加入至父節點的集合。A node structure is created by adding objects to the collection of a parent node. > [!NOTE] > 當節點的屬性設定為`true`，必須以動態方式填入節點。When the property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically. 您無法以宣告方式建立巢狀其; 下的另一個節點否則，會在頁面上發生錯誤。You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page. 支援的瀏覽器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 相容的瀏覽器和更新版本) 也可以利用用戶端節點填入。Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population. 啟用時，這可讓控制項來擴展以動態方式在用戶端上的節點展開該節點時，這會避免需回傳至伺服器。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on client-side node population, see . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以填入中的節點以動態方式在伺服器上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to populate the nodes in the control dynamically on the server. 請注意，屬性設定為`false`來防止在用戶端上處理的展開節點事件。Notice that the property is set to `false` to prevent expanding-node events from being handled on the client. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/CS/treeviewtreenodepopulatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodePopulate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodePopulate/VB/treeviewtreenodepopulatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`false`，則不會呈現控制項。If the property is set to `false`, the control is not rendered.
